full_summary:
**Two Intermediate Statistical Analysts**

**Title:** Two Intermediate Statistical Analysts
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01022164
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2023-16

**Background:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking two (2) Intermediate Statistical Analysts to support the Directorate Air Strategic Management (D Air SM) within the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). The incumbents will assist D Air SM in developing analytics products for the RCAF’s Analytics Support Centre (RASC).

**Scope of Work:**
The successful bidder(s) will provide the services of two (2) Intermediate Statistical Analysts with expertise in data analysis, visualization, and predictive modeling. The incumbents will work in collaboration with D Air SM to develop analytics products that support decision-making and business intelligence for the RCAF.

**Duration:**
The contract will be for a duration of two (2) years with three (3) irrevocable option years, allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s).

**Security Clearance:**
Security clearance is required for this project. The incumbents must hold a valid Secret security clearance, which will be verified by the Government of Canada.

**Method of Procurement:**
This procurement is being conducted through the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method, which is a result of a formal competitive process established through extensive consultations with industry.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**
This requirement is open only to those pre-qualified suppliers under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 2.9 Statistical Analyst.

**Instructions to Bidders:**
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through email to the DND Point of Contact. The RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact:

Sharon Sally
DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca
819-939-8990

**Closing Date:** February 6, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
